claim(uint256).details: To claim a single user's token, if the number of token types is greater than maxClaimTokens, multiple claims are required.

claim(uint256,address).details: To claim a single user's token, if the number of token types is greater than maxClaimTokens, multiple claims are required.

getUserTokens(uint256).details: Get the token list of the specified user

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pushAward(uint256,address,uint256).details: Add an unclaimed reward, this method can only be called by the Task contract. When calling, the corresponding Token must be transferred.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

maxClaimTokens().notice: The maximum number of token types that can be claimed at one time.

maxClaimUsers().notice: The upper limit of the number of users that can be called in a single call when claiming user tokens in batches
